name: Solitaire ◆
description:
This brand new fully featured Solitaire is the best Solitaire game you'll ever play! From the amazing Live Backgrounds and Daily Challenges to the classic intuitive gameplay, we promise the most robust and satisfying Solitaire experience you will find in the App Store.

Relax with a game at home, during your busy commute to work, or on the plane. Unlimited winning deals ensures you’ll never run out of interesting games to exercise your brain.

Track your progress and game stats to beat your best times and scores or see how you rank against other players in the Leaderboards.

The best looking card game in the store for an aesthetic play experience:
• Live Backgrounds provide wonderfully relaxing, ambient animations
• Beautifully crafted and curated themes
• Fun and dynamic win animations!
• Use our custom card backs, faces, designs, or choose from gallery

Customize your play style, from the look and feel to each and every rule:
• Draw 1 card
• Draw 3 cards
• Vegas scoring (-$52)
• Unlimited Undo’s
• Left handed support
• UI customizations
• Statistics tracker records your play history
• Game Center support for leaderboards and achievements
• Portrait and Landscape mode
• And much, much more!

Daily Challenges: Check in for a NEW challenge every day!
• Complete unique and puzzling challenges
• Unlock and master achievements to earn trophies for every month!
• Earn bronze, silver, and gold trophies. The better you do, the more you'll win.

Fans of Solitaire (also known as Patience or Klondike) or any of its variants, such as Tri-Peaks or Spider, will feel right at home with our classic style and gameplay. A great game for Poker and Blackjack players too!

We set out to make the best Solitaire available for the App Store and we hope you'll enjoy it. Check back again for updates on new features, theme packs, and more!

For fast and friendly support, email us at contact@maplemedia.io.
